credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions: H x diam.: 33 x 11.8 cm (13 x 4 5/8 in.)
title: Vase
description: Cast white clay body.  Elongated ovoid body with raised cylindrical neck, slightly flaring; circular foot.  Underglazed slip-decoration on front with three stalks of golden yellow foxgloves, with green leaves and stems.  Central stalk extends over shoulder and onto neck.  Background shaded from green at base to gold at shoulder.  Allover yellow glaze; fine crackle.  Bottom and interior glazed.
name: Vase
